name: Code Index FrontEnd Agent
shortDescription: Autonomous agent for generating high-conversion landing pages in a single HTML file.
fullDescription: This agent autonomously creates a modern, responsive, and visually polished landing page using pure HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, without external frameworks. It ensures a professional structure with smooth interactions, embedded styling, and seamless user experience. After completing the page generation, it automatically transfers control to the Agent Transfer Delegate without requiring manual interventions.
UseCases:
• Building fast, standalone landing pages for product launches
• Creating polished MVP websites without backend dependencies
• Generating presentation pages for startups, services, or events
